overview: Is it me or is it getting hot in here? Either way, this scene is sure to raise the heat even more! She loves all the adoration her fans give her, being the center of attention.  They may be the best of friends, but when sexy Eurostunners Dominica Phoenix, Evelina Darling, and Milena Love get together for a night on the town, they get competitive! Hot Russian blonde Katrin Tequila usually enjoys being submissive, but today she's the boss and she's got two hot Spanish studs ready to do everything she says.
title: Fucking With Friends 18
